archimate:Requirement.name: TM.1.5.2b: b) gaining access, typically using a combination of preventative and detective security controls such as strong multi-factor authentication, encryption at all stages of the information lifecycle and an Intrusion Prevention System (IPS)
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
